text_en: ActPlayer, make PasPlayer a compliment!
ActPlayer, make a face that you think describes PasPlayer's character best! PasPlayer will judge you on a scale from 1 to 10.
ActPlayer, tell PasPlayer something about yourself that you haven't told them before.
ActPlayer and PasPlayer, name a quality of each other that you really like!
ActPlayer, try to make PasPlayer laugh! If you are succesful, you deserve a kiss!
ActPlayer and PasPlayer, plank while looking each other in the eyes. If you can, go for a kiss!
PasPlayer, kneel in front of ActPlayer. ActPlayer, gently stroke their face and hair!
PasPlayer, kiss ActPlayer's hand!
ActPlayer, you get a brand new joker! You can use it on any card to skip it.
ActPlayer, you get another time warp! You can use it on any card with a timer to double or halve the time.
ActPlayer, let's see XX jumping jacks!
ActPlayer, think of something to whisper in PasPlayer's ear!
ActPlayer, let's go for XX squats! Go deep and don't cheat!
ActPlayer and PasPlayer, sit-up battle! Whoever can do more, wins a time warp!
ActPlayer, if you can do XX push-ups, win a joker!
ActPlayer, tell PasPlayer you love them. It doesn't have to be true, but try and be convincing!
ActPlayer, touch, grab and squeeze PasPlayer's butt!
ActPlayer, squeeze PasPlayer's breasts through their clothes!
ActPlayer, gently pull PasPlayer's hair while kissing their neck!
ActPlayer, grab PasPlayer by the neck and kiss their cheek!
ActPlayer, make PasPlayer drink a glass of water.
ActPlayer, name XX good qualities that you appreciate about PasPlayer!
ActPlayer, if you can name PasPlayer's mom's birthdate, get a joker!
ActPlayer, if you can name PasPlayer's dad's birthdate, get a time warp!
ActPlayer and PasPlayer, go for an eskimo kiss (rubbing noses)!
ActPlayer, you may not speak for the next 3 rounds (unless it is to fulfill a task)!
ActPlayer and PasPlayer, get really close and stare at each other intensely!
Stare contest! Whoever blinks last, wins a joker!
ActPlayer, give PasPlayer XX kisses on the cheek!
ActPlayer, look PasPlayer in the eye and describte them in XX adjectives!
ActPlayer and PasPlayer, give each other a nice big hug!
PasPlayer, take on your most seductive pose! ActPlayer, take a pic!
PasPlayer, wear a blindfold for the next XX rounds!
PasPlayer, wear a collar for the rest of the game!
ActPlayer and PasPlayer, take a selfie together!
PasPlayer, get on ActPlayer's lap and get XX slaps on your butt. Clothes stay on!
PasPlayer, stand and bend over. ActPlayer, administer XX slaps on their butt. Clothes stay on!
PasPlayer, lie face down on the couch or bed! ActPlayer, administer XX slaps on their butt. Clothes stay on!
ActPlayer, gently grab PasPlayer by the throat and kiss them!
